title: Dislocations in Spinel: Structure and Properties of Extended Defects in MgO•nAl2O3
content: This presentation provides an introduction to the crystallography of dislocations in magnesium aluminate spinel compounds with general formula, MgO•nAl2O3. Much of our fundamental understanding of dislocation structures in spinel is due to the seminal work of Professor Terrence (Terry) E. Mitchell. Terry's contributions to this area of fundamental ceramic science will be highlighted throughout the course of this presentation.
